name: Evolver Ship
description:
My small Evolver Ship game. Unfortunatly i couldnt finish in time as i am dad of two and both were sick.
Have fun with the game:


Story:
Evolver ships of which grandmother told me as a child, many stories boast about these legendary capital ships of an ancient species.

These ships are said to have been able to conquer entire galaxies in a coup, but no one has ever seen one, let alone flown one.

And now after all the years of searching I found one and actually flew it.

This feeling to sit in a real Evolver ship is just ...

... disappointing. The ship is small, slow and the armament. Well, what armament...

Thanks grandmother.....

Large number of enemy ships located, dimensional jump not yet available.

Activate emergency protocol...

Override valid security parameters... 

Emergency arming activated...

Start data core decryption... 

Start Behemoth evolution process.

Dimenssion jump available in 5 minutes 

Not finished:
- sfx are not implemented
- evolving system prepared but deactivated all are available asap
- ship AI voice lines

Known Bugs:
- Escape not working - Quit with ALF+F4 (only in "Main Menu")
- Space Key - Slowmo Buggy can cause problems with the game


I guess i will continou to finish the game.

cheers
Dacow
